name: invoice
room_description: There is an invoice located on the desk here.
look_description: This appears to be an invoice for medical services from a physician named Dr. Franklin Peters. The invoice contains charges for a prescription for a drug called Thalium. You notice there are a lot of entries for this drug and the prescribed dosage appears to be increasing over time.

read.text: This appears to be an invoice for medical services from a physician named Dr. Franklin Peters. The invoice contains charges for a prescription for a drug called Thalium. You notice there are a lot of entries for this drug and the prescribed dosage appears to be increasing over time.

touch.text: The paper is old and thin.

crumple.text: You crumple up the invoice and throw it on the floor. You stomp on it for good measure. You pause for a moment before deciding that the invoice might be important. You pick it back up and flatten it out again.

throw away.text: You crumple up the invoice and throw it on the floor. You stomp on it for good measure. You pause for a moment before deciding that the invoice might be important. You pick it back up and flatten it out again.

destroy.text: You crumple up the invoice and throw it on the floor. You stomp on it for good measure. You pause for a moment before deciding that the invoice might be important. You pick it back up and flatten it out again.
